It wont mount the images ><

However I do know how to fix it >=D Open the .cue files in wordpad (or notepad) then on the first line you'll see something about rld-stzc.bin inside quotes. Just change that to CD1.bin CD2.bin or CD3.bin and save the files. Once you've done that to all 3 cue files, they will work right :) (note the rld-stzc is for the third disk... the first two will have a or b as the last letter most likly)
